channel.title: 600+ Changing developer console color
channel.description:
I've had this for a while and have never seen it posted anywhere so i decided to share it, enjoy!
Search for this in your client [CODE]0x332277[/CODE]
And replace the 332277 with your hex color code so red would be [CODE]0xff0000[/CODE]
To make the console transparent, uncomment the single line where you edited the color hex.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0GGW4fd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YZJHIID.png[/img]

item.title: 600+ Changing developer console color
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Do you know how to modify the opacity of the console? I think a more transparent red would like nice.
